DOC.brief_summary: This study is a single arm, single center clinical trial that aims to evaluate the effect of 8 weeks of vitamin K2 replacement (360 mcg/day) on the progression of arterial stiffness in stable renal transplant patients.
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin K2 Supplementation and Arterial Stiffness in the Renal Transplant Population (The KING Trial)
DOC.criteria: Functional renal graft Stable renal function for at least 3 months prior to enrollment History of thrombotic events Diagnosed coagulopathy Cardiovascular event in the past month prior to enrollment Current or planned pregnancy Lactation Soy allergy Concomitant or recent (past 6 months) use of supplements that contain vitamin K Warfarin treatment Known intestinal malabsorption or hypomotility syndromes
